TextView.android:text: Baghdad Tourist Visit is a tourist island at the northern tip of the city of Baghdad in the Tigris River. It includes a tower, a city of games, restaurants, a cinema and theatrical show, squares, and beautiful gardens. The geographical name of the island was Al-Suraidat Island. km north of Baghdad in the district of 16 Seven Abkar in the district of Al-Fahhama located in the middle of orchards and many and abundant trees. The study of establishing the entertainment center began in 1979, and this island was established as one of the tourism projects in the year 1983 AD by the Finnish company YII.
